adrFormatAddress: 304 Columbus Ave # 4C, New York, NY 10023-1968, USA

originalText.text: Basia made me a custom, cathedral-length veil with hand-sewn pearls and a blusher for one fourth of what I would have paid for it anywhere else. She is speedy and diligent. She has years of experience and knows just what to recommend. A true craftswoman and expert at what she does. Highly recommend.

text.text: Basia made me a custom, cathedral-length veil with hand-sewn pearls and a blusher for one fourth of what I would have paid for it anywhere else. She is speedy and diligent. originalText.text:
Veil Recommendation!

I got married on 6/4/22 and my dress was simple so I really wanted a long dramatic detailed cathedral veil. I had a hard time finding something until I came across Basia Custom Headdresses in NYC.

The detail and skill of Basia, I can’t recommend her enough. She is kind and I felt like I was at my grandmas apartment. I asked if she wanted a deposit and she said “no that’s ok I trust you”. To be honest I’d much rather give my money to someone like this that I know will do an amazing job. That same day I went to about 5 other bridal shops and just wasn’t impressed with the veils but Basia - she has hundreds in her apartment, the most stunning to the most simple. Crowns, headpieces - all of it.

She made my veil custom (in 2 weeks) and my veil was 1/4 of the price that I would have paid at Kleinfeld for something similar.

originalText.text: I can not say enough about Basia. I think she is telepathic. If you are browsing through these reviews wondering what you should do… GO SEE BASIA! My first appointment with Basia, I showed her pictures in my dress and photos of our wedding venue. I told Basia generally what I liked/was thinking and left trusting her fully that she would create something beautiful. After seeing my dress she concluded that the length of veil I should get should be different than what I was originally thinking. I’m glad that I listened to her. After all she knows what she is talking about. My veil is unique and unlike anything I could buy in a store (plus for something handmade with this much detail the price is right). Basia exceeded my expectations and then some!

originalText.text: I had a fantastic experience having a custom veil made from Basia. She is the sweetest person and was highly focused on making sure I got the veil and quality that I wanted. A highlight of my whole wedding journey was working with her and I highly recommend!

text.text: I had a fantastic experience having a custom veil made from Basia. She is the sweetest person and was highly focused on making sure I got the veil and quality that I wanted. A highlight of my whole wedding journey was working with her and I highly recommend!

originalText.text: My daughter's veil was custom made by "Sasha", a sweet wonderful lady who knew exactly what you wanted. The price was a third of what other places charged. She had the veil done 2months after ordering.  I believe she could have had it finished in 2 weeks if needed. We could not have been more pleased.
